title: Switch
summaries: The Switch is an activation mechanism purchased from the Mechanic for 20. It can also be found in the Dungeon connected to Chain Lanterns, where it can be harvested with a Pickaxe or Drill.

The Switch can be placed on top or on the sides of <linked>blocks</linked>, or on the sides of <linked>Wooden Beams</linked> or trees. Switches can also be placed on background walls. It is activated by right-clicking on it.

Despite its name, the Switch does not need to act as an on/off mechanism. When wired to <linked>Dart Traps</linked>, for example, right-clicking the Switch will always cause the Trap to shoot, the same as a <linked>Pressure Plate</linked> would, no matter which position the switch happens to be in.
